    Includes methods to apply saved annotators to text

    rex

    • Method Detail

      • setActive

        public static void setActive(boolean[] n_active)
        Change the activation of modules in GeoGeoDisambiguator. All modules are activated by default.
        It is recommended to not make any changes.
        Parameters:
        n_active -

      • loadModel

        public static edu.cmu.minorthird.text.learn.SequenceAnnotatorLearner.SequenceAnnotator loadModel(java.lang.String label)
        Load a serialized annotator.
        Parameters:
        label - limited to "city", "SP" and "country"
        Returns:
        the corresponding annotator

      • annotate

        public static edu.cmu.minorthird.text.BasicTextLabels annotate(edu.cmu.minorthird.text.learn.SequenceAnnotatorLearner.SequenceAnnotator ann,
                                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> text)
        Annotate text
        Parameters:
        ann - the annotator loaded by calling loadModel
        text - an ArrayList of Strings; the number of Tweets in each element of the ArrayList should be small (less than 100).
        It is recommended to put ONE Tweet as an element of the ArrayList, otherwise the third module in GeoGeoDisambiguator won't work properly; in that case deactivate this module.
        Returns:

      • disambiguate
